> //Cap the weights at 3.0 (experimental)
> if (((*curgene)->lnk)->weight>3.0) 
>      ((*curgene)->lnk)->weight=3.0;
> else if (((*curgene)->lnk)->weight<-3.0)
>      ((*curgene)->lnk)->weight=3.0;

In case anyone else copied and pasted this code like I
did...  I think the last line should be:

((*curgene)->lnk)->weight=-3.0;

Tyler
